aboutUs.heroSubtitle: More than just a sport – a family and a way of life!
aboutUs.intro: RANDORI-PRO pursues the vision of helping everyone in our community achieve their personal goals. We offer you a family-like environment where we support and help each other. Children, adults, and families, as well as competitive athletes, are “at home” with us.
aboutUs.missionText: To help every person become the best version of themselves and achieve their set goals!
aboutUs.promiseText: With us, you will reach your goals because WE LOVE WHAT WE DO and make you the most efficient weapon against the “problems” of your life.
aboutUs.history: Since 1994, Randori-Pro Sports School has offered martial arts and fitness for all ages and skill levels. With over 3000 members at five Berlin locations, we are Germany's largest provider.

principles.title: Community, Team, Family
principles.text: We place great value on offering our members a sense of safety and security in our sports schools. For this reason, we have created a family atmosphere.

principles.title: Everything as Part of the Big Picture
principles.text: All our actions pursue a deeper meaning. For example, we build our self-defense courses on three stable pillars: Technique, Physique, Theory.

principles.title: Stagnation is the End
principles.text: We know that we are not perfect. However, we strive for perfection and keep our eyes open to incorporate new, better elements into our training.

principles.title: Quality and Customer Benefit
principles.text: We pay attention to the uncompromising quality of our services. We want to have a positive influence by supporting people in their personal development.
